name: Space Rocks (itch) (pyman)
description:
Modern version of Asteroids with a twin-stick(ish) vibe. Endless.

Press space to switch graphics!

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Left mouse to fire.

Right mouse or enter key to hyperspace (once per level)

Hyperspace puts you in a random point in the level, handy for getting out of a bind.

Extra life every 10,000 points.

Imaginatively titled.
